connection

Class SQL

  • java.lang.Object
    • connection.SQL

  • public class SQL
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to handle SQL/database related operations.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static void connect()
        Establishes a connection with the database. Called from the main method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is an error connecting to the database.

      • updateUser

        public static void updateUser(User theClient)
        Updates (or creates if it doesn't exist) the credentials of a user in the database. Should be called upon any change to the user.
        Parameters:
        theClient - The user to be added.

      • updateUser

        public static void updateUser(User theClient,
                              java.lang.String theEmail)
        Updates (or creates if it doesn't exist) the credentials of a user in the database. Should be called upon any change to the user.
        Parameters:
        theClient - The user to be added.

      • updateProject

        public static void updateProject(Project theProject)
        Updates (or creates if it doesn't exist) a project in the database. Should be called upon any change to a project's properties (items not included).
        Parameters:
        theProject - The project to be added.

      • updateItem

        public static void updateItem(Project theProject,
                              Item theItem)
        Updates (or creates if it doesn't exist) a single item in the database. Should be called upon any change to an item's properties.
        Parameters:
        theProject - The project attached to the item, to get its id
        theItem - The item to be added

      • getLastUser

        public static User getLastUser()
        Returns the the last user who signed in.
        Returns:
        The last user who signed in.

      • getAllUsers

        public static java.lang.String getAllUsers()
        Returns a list of users.
        Returns:
        A list of users.

      • emailExists

        public static boolean emailExists(java.lang.String theEmail)
        Checks whether the given email address exists in the DB.
        Parameters:
        theEmail - The email to check.
        Returns:
        True if the email exists in the DB, false otherwise.

      • login

        public static int login(User theClient)
        Attempts to log in the given client.
        Parameters:
        theClient - The user information that is attempting to log in.
        Returns:
        0 if the email is not found, 1 if successful login, 2 if password doesn't match, and 3 if there is a misc login error.

      • createProject

        public static Project createProject(Project theProject)
        Attempts to create the given project. Should only be called when a project is first created.
        Parameters:
        theProject - The project to be created.
        Returns:
        An updated project reference with ids on the project and its items if successful, null otherwise

      • createItem

        public static Item createItem(int theProjectId,
                              Item theItem)
        Attempts to create the given item. Should only be called when an item is first created.
        Parameters:
        theProjectId - The project id the item is associated with.
        theItem - The item to be created.
        Returns:
        An updated item reference with its database id if successful, null otherwise
